data.eml:eml: Home at last: the enigmatic genera Eriachaenium and Adenocaulon (Compositae, Mutisioideae, Mutisieae, Adenocaulinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Funk, Vicki A., Pasini, Eduardo, Bonifacino, J. Mauricio, Katinas, Liliana (2016): Home at last: the enigmatic genera Eriachaenium and Adenocaulon (Compositae, Mutisioideae, Mutisieae, Adenocaulinae). PhytoKeys 60: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.60.6795, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.60.6795
